item.title: Hugo Time
item.description: Hugo, hugo, hugo…. üòí->üòÅ is what i would describe My journery through the “Wonderous” world of hugo as…. i did the task twice and it has been a headache but right now as i am typing this, the entire thing seems so easy and clean like dammmnnn….this is all you gotta do to get a blog up and running….. anyways i’ll talk about both attempts seperately Attempt-1 I started by looking up what hugo is then browsing thrugh their site, lookin’ at themes and then looked up how to set up hugo and making blogs with it.
